doc:
Steven Weber (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steven_Weber_(actor) 0 Steven Robert Weber (born March 4, 1961) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Brian Hackett on the television show Wings which aired from April 1990 to May 1997 on NBC and as Sam Blue in Once and Again. He had a recurring role on iZombie as Vaughn du Clark. He plays Mayor Douglas Hamilton on NCIS: New Orleans in a recurring role. Steven_Robert_Weber ( born March_4_,_1961 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_role as Brian_Hackett on the_television_show_Wings which aired from April_1990 to May_1997 on NBC and as Sam_Blue in Once_and_Again . He had a_recurring_role on iZombie as Vaughn_du_Clark . He plays Mayor_Douglas_Hamilton on NCIS : New Orleans in a_recurring_role .
